title: Late Night Lit: Joseph Han | Taylor Hahn
description:
On this month's episode of Late Night Lit, Late Night's Sarah Jenks-Daly chats with Joseph Han, author of "Nuclear Family" and Taylor Hahn, author of "The Lifestyle." Plus, actor and comedian D'Arcy Carden shares what book she recommends for your next read.
